name: MyGet
description: MyGet allows you to create and host your own NuGet feeds with your own packages and those from other package sources such as NuGet.org

actions.name: Trigger a MyGet build
actions.description: Trigger a MyGet build, which is based on several conventions.Learn more

inputDescriptors.name: Feed
inputDescriptors.description: The MyGet private or public feed where to trigger a build

inputDescriptors.name: Build source identifier
inputDescriptors.description: The MyGet build source identifier which defines the sources to build

actions.name: Publish NuGet package to MyGet
actions.description: Publish NuGet package produced in a build to a MyGet feed

inputDescriptors.name: Feed
inputDescriptors.description: The MyGet private or public feed where to publish the packages

inputDescriptors.name: Package source identifier
inputDescriptors.description: The MyGet package source identifier which defines the packages to publish
